entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as having a memory in the Pensieve and is asked by Harry whose memory it is. He responds that it is his own.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is diving after Dumbledore through the shifting silver mass to retrieve a memory from the Pensieve

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is mentioned as sleeping on his perch in Dumbledore's office.

relationships.description: Harry dives after Dumbledore through the shifting silver mass to retrieve a memory from the Pensieve
Dumbledore owns Fawkes, as he is mentioned as having him in his office.
